Header: 58 Division Troops Contribute to Cleaning Programme
Content: Troops of the 16 (Volunteer) Gemunu Regiment under the 58 Division recently organized a cleaning programme at Galle Panagamuwa Amarasinghe Primary School premises in Wanchawala after a request to that effect was made. More than 10 Other Rankers took part in the drive with the participation of several others working in the school.
